text.en: Sovereign of all families, Guru Mighty Skull Garland,2
text.en-trans: rik kün khyab dak lama tötreng tsal
gang gi gyutrul rolpé rigpa dzin

text.en: The succession of your incarnations, a garland of mother pearls,
text.en-trans: kyé treng rim jön mutik norbü treng

text.en: Right down to the primary lord of the family, power-wielding chief of all,
text.en-trans: tsawé rikdak tsal chang yong kyi jé

text.en: The universal monarch, most eminent great tertön,
To this entire golden garland of successive vidyādharas,
text.en-trans: rigdzin rim jön ser treng tamché la

text.en: I pray! Grant your blessings unfailingly!
text.en-trans: soldeb lumé jingyi lab tu sol
